attributes.action: Tell Ofcom to require the BBC to debate The China Study properly and impartially
attributes.background: A recent BBC Horizon documentary misrepresented Dr T Colin Campbell's findings in The China Study. Ofcom's ruling (ref 00433122) on my complaint to the BBC was unacceptable. See petition text: http://wholistnutrition.com/bbc-campaign/4-uk-government-and-parliament-petition-text

rejection.details: Ofcom is accountable to Parliament, but the Government and Parliament cannot instruct it to take action in this way.
